ConfirmEmailPage.title: Confirm email
ConfirmEmailPage.description: We have sent a 6-digit code to your email. Please enter the code below to confirm your email.

error.invalid: The OTP should have exactly 6 digits

400.title: Error
400.message: The OTP you entered is not valid or has expired

200.title: Success
200.message: The email has been verified successfully, you will be redirected to next step in few seconds

500.title: Server Error
500.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
